name: Water Flask
desc: A specialized flask of water often utilized by Waterbound as a mobile source of water.
effect: While full, this may be used as a Water _Source_ with a value of 2.
special: Whenever you would place a Water _Source_ or inflict _Soaked_ you may reduce the value of the Water _Source_/_Soaked_ to instead refill this. For example, if you would place 3 _Wet_ spaces and this Accessory was empty, you may instead place 1 _Wet_ space to refill it.
